title: Advanced Swedish Curriculum Parser with Multi-format Output
description: Comprehensive Python script for parsing Skolverket ARTI syllabi with automatic subject bridge generation
prompt: Write Python code using PyMuPDF or pdfplumber to extract and parse Swedish curriculum documents (like Skolverket ARTI syllabi). The script should identify and categorize kunskapskrav sections by grade levels (E/C/A), extract key competency descriptors, and automatically generate potential bridge connections to other subjects (Svenska, Historia, Samhällskunskap) based on keyword matching. Output structured data in multiple formats: CSV for spreadsheet import, JSON for web applications, and markdown for documentation. Include error handling for malformed PDFs, support for both Swedish and English text extraction, and a configuration file system for customizing subject bridge mappings.
